description: Columns boxes and label in train_image are somewhat redundant boxes contains location and size of the boxes label contains location xmin ymin xmax ymax of the boxes and confidence which for the training data is always 1 So we don t need boxes column we can just use the info from label column. In these cases patients were imaged more than once on the same date time same StudyInstanceUID. Explaining some confusing aspects of the dataEvery image in train_image data is assigned to one study in train_study data StudyInstanceUID column. 7 0 0 1 1 indeterminate 0. This format is often used in the medical images since it contains information about the patient to avoid mismatching the patients data. But one study can contain multiple images more info in the STUDY DATA section. The label column in train_image datalabel column has a structure a for image with no boxes none 1 0 0 1 1 b for image with boxes opacity 1 if there is more than one box there are multiple labels like this in a row for example opacity 1 789. In other cases different image processing is applied the images look almost identical but there is subtle change in contrast. But if you are not sure about your prediction you can also try multilabel classification for example 2b95d54e4be65_study negative 0. DICOM format can be handled using pydicom package see more https pydicom. STUDY DATAFor most of the studies 5822 out of 6334 there is only 1 image but for some there are more up to 9 images.
